main event: An observer reported seeing a UFO with two small figures in Churchville, New York, on August 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 50 feet long and 6 feet wide., The figures observed were described as being the size of midgets., The observer reported the object was stationary at times and could maneuver quickly., A hissing sound was noted during the sighting., The object reportedly emitted a distinct puff of smoke before disappearing at high speed.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object with two small figures
